entry.title: https://github.com/UVVM/UVVM
entry.content: UVVM (Universal VHDL Verification Methodology) is a free and Open Source Methodology and Library for very efficient VHDL verification of FPGA and ASIC ‚Äì resulting also in significant quality improvement. Community forum: https://forum.uvvm.org/ UVVM.org: https://uvvm.org/

entry.title: https://github.com/VUnit/vunit
entry.content: VUnit is a unit testing framework for VHDL/SystemVerilog
